angularDescription: Small Projects with Angular, Flexbox & Firebase, using different functionality like: Search Component, Card with items, Security Login, etc.
advCSSDescription: This card was created with the following CSS property: perspective, linear-gradient, clip-path with different sizes, backface-visibility.
flexboxDescription: Projects created with Flexbox, HTML5, CSS3 & @animations. BEM methodology & Mask property was used in this Landing page.
newsletterDescription: Small landing pages created with flexbox, SASS, using BEM and Font Awesome. The Landing pages are totally responsive and animated.
